columns.dc:description: The name of the organisation to which the dataset relates.
The Uniform Resource Identifier which contains the description of the organisation.
The financial year in which the funeral took place in the format YYYY/YY.
The calendar year in which the funeral took place in the format YYYY.
The actual date that the funeral took place in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
The total cost in GBP of providing the funeral.
Whether the funeral was a Burial or a Cremation.
Gender of the person. NA indicates this information is not available.
Age in years of the person at the time of death. NA indicates this information is not available.
